item.title: First Post
item.description:
Well, hello there, I am Alok Patel, an undergrad currently pursuing my Bachelors. Well I decided to start this blog page for a few things:

  • To share my code journey.
  • To my content writing skills.
  • For my daily life musings.

Right now i can think only of these things..

My Coding journey

As of now, I am learning React.js along with fiddling around with cli tools and Neovim as my IDE. You can see some of my works here. I’ll share my experience with Neovim in a seperate blog.
